revision.text: ==The Crown of Galar== '''Note:''' After fulfilling the prerequisites, this quest can be accepted in the Bulletin Board in [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Freezington]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ The Crown of Galar ! Type !! Requirement !! Reward |- | Prerequisite || Defeat [[Gyms#Wyndon Stadium|Champion Leon]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Peony in [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Freezington]] || N/A |- | Defeat Temporary Battle || Defeat [[Temporary Battles#Galar|Calyrex]] [[File:Calyrex.png|25px]] in [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Freezington]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Calyrex in [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Freezington]] || N/A |- | Defeat Pokémon || Defeat 50 Pokémon in [[Galar#Routes|Old Cemetery]] and [[Galar#Routes|Snowslide Slope]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Calyrex in [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Freezington]] || N/A |- | Defeat Temporary Battles || Defeat [[Temporary Battles#Galar|Spectrier]] [[File:Spectrier.png|25px]] and [[Temporary Battles#Galar|Glastrier]] [[File:Glastrier.png|25px]] in [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Freezington]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Calyrex in [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Freezington]] || Spectrier [[File:Spectrier.png|25px]] and Glastrier [[File:Glastrier.png|25px]] start roaming in Crown Tundra |- | Catch Pokémon || Catch Spectrier [[File:Spectrier.png|25px]] and Glastrier [[File:Glastrier.png|25px]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Calyrex in [[Crown Shrine]] || Adds Calyrex [[File:Calyrex.png|25px]] to [[Crown Shrine]] |- | Catch Pokémon || Catch Calyrex [[File:Calyrex.png|25px]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Talk to Peony in [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Freezington]] || N/A |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
